formalpara.title: Movie 2. Initial QR polarization and migration.
formalpara.para: Movie shows a QR neuroblast at the onset of initial migration. It has sent an anterior protrusion reaching over seam cell V4. Over time, the cell body follows the protruding front and at the end of initial migration QR is positioned above seam cell V4. Markers as in Movie 1. Thirty min time intervals shown at 1 frame/s, dorsal is up, anterior is left. Movie is adapted from (Middelkoop et al., 2012).
